snippet: The ATS will be offered with three powertrain choices, two transmissions and an optional Borg Warner all-wheel-drive system.
abstract: The ATS will be offered with three powertrain choices, two transmissions and an optional Borg Warner all-wheel-drive system.
lead_paragraph: Introduced on Sunday, Jan. 8: 2013 Cadillac ATS.

headline.main: Cadillac Spells Its BMW 3 Series Fighter ATS
